name: Cyber Rise
description:
CYBER RISE

Hackers are trying to erase you from the mainframe! Survive for as long as you can by collecting orbs to slow the Rise!


CONTROLS

Move: Arrow keys or WASD keys
Jump: Space bar

Moving left or right will move you along an isometric axis.


CREDITS

Art/Music/Coding: Teddy Bradford (@teddybradford)
Coding: Chip Bradford
